> Note: If you don't want the overhead of
> downloading all the URLs in the collection and
> deleting them one by one, you probably need the
> container to handle a POST whose body is "delete
> contents."  But handling this sort of message is
> really an optimization and all the warnings about
> optimizations apply here.

Not to mention that you're bypassing the generic
interface constraint and reducing visibility.

WM
